level.text: The official designation of restricted use pesticides as declared by the EPA under the provisions of ยง 3(d)(1)(c) of FIFRA shall be adopted by the District.

For the protection, health, and welfare of the people in the District, and after a public hearing, the Director may add to the official designation of restricted use pesticides of the District pesticides that are not included in the federal regulations.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 25 DCR 3044 (October 6, 1978), incorporating Proposed Rulemaking published at 25 DCR 2118 (August 25, 1978).
